snippet.title: THE GOLF CLUB 2 - FIRST LOOK TRAILER
snippet.description: Take a look inside The Golf Club 2, the upcoming sequel to the highly acclaimed, hugely popular sports game, The Golf Club. With a load of new and improved features including a Career Mode, enhanced Course Creator, competitive Societies, advanced swing mechanic, online tournaments, and more than 100,000 user-generated courses to play, The Golf Club 2 is the most authentic and exciting golf game ever created. Pre-order now to get exclusive content on Day One. Learn more at www.thegolfclub2.com.
